Package cryptoTrader.models.brokerModel

Class BrokerModel

java.lang.Object
cryptoTrader.models.brokerModel.BrokerModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
UpdateBrokerModel
public class BrokerModel extends Object implements UpdateBrokerModel
This class represents the BrokerModel in the Model system. This BrokerModel adds a new broker, removes an existing broker, and edits the data about an existing broker.
Author:
Yakup Tezcan, Wesley James Fortin, Reginald Pierre Harder, TSUNG-YING TSAI This class implements UpdateBrokerModel as an interface.
